  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Drawable, GameBoardDisplayAdapter

    public class Maze3DDisplayer
extends MazeDisplayer

    Maze3DDisplayer

    This class extends MazeDisplayer class and its handle the drawing the maze 3d and the character image
